mapper.insert: insert into mg_color (color_id, color_name, color_type, sale_type, price, group_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by) values (#{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mg_color set color_name = #{colorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_type = #{colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_type = #{saleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select color_id, color_name, color_type, sale_type, price,group_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by from mg_color where color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
